page.title: 04SCHOOL LIFE
page.content: PUPILS ARE ABLE TO JOIN IN MANY ACTIVITIES e.g. RUGBY TEAMS, SOCCER AND NETBALL TEAMS AS WELL AS THE ORCHESTRA AND CHESS CLUB. MEALS ARE PROVIDED IN BOTH SCHOOLS AND AVERAGE OF 55% HAVE THESE MEALS. IN CONTRAST TO THE COED EVA SCHOOLS HENLLYS SCHOOL IS OVER ONE HUNDRED YEARS OLD HAVING OPENED IN 1878. IT IS A STONE_BUILT, RURAL SCHOOL WITH TWENTY-NINE PUPILS, RANGING FROM 4 TO 11 YEARS OLD, AND TWO TEACHERS INCLUDING THE HEAD TEACHER. THESE NUMBERS ARE STEADY. ABOUT 66% OF PUPILS HAVE MEALS PROVIDED BY THE SCHOOL AT MID-DAY. THE CURRICULUM FOLLOWED IS SIMILAR TO THAT OF THE MODERN SCHOOLS BUT ITS SMALL SIZE MAKES IT DIFFICULT TO RUN SCHOOL TEAMS IN SOCCER,RUGBY OR NETBALL. AT THE AGE OF 11 THE PUPILS TRANSFER TO FAIRWATER COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOL.
